title: Meghalaya Lady Doctor Takes The Wheel, Drives Ambulance & Transports Pregnant Woman To Hospital
text:
It was just another day for Dr Balnamchi Sangma, except that it wasn’t. She found a pregnant lady in need of help and decided to offer help to her by driving her in an ambulance from Garobadha PHC to Maternity and Child Hospital (MCH) Tura.

The pregnant woman had been admitted with serious complications at Garobadha PHC which is Sangma’s workplace. But as there were no facilities of handling her at the PHC, the doctors decided to transfer her immediately to MCH Tura for proper treatment.

Northeast Now

With her health conditions deteriorating and without wasting any time, she had to be taken immediately to the hospital in Tura. This is when Sangma emerged as a saviour for the helpless pregnant lady as she took it upon herself to drive her to the hospital safely from the remote place in an ambulance.

The lady doctor was the only one at the PHC who truly lived up and helped the woman in need. Sangma is indeed an inspiration for people!

Another incident happened, where a woman found a doe in distress, stuck between a fence when she was on her way to Stone Mountain Park. The deer’s hind legs were stuck between the bars of a metal fence. She exerted herself to free the doe and she manages to do that successfully.
